articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Chemical Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Chemical Complex 
Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the gasification process construction site of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the February 8 Vinalon Complex.
					
					 After being briefed on the complex before a map on its production, he looked round the dyes and agricultural chemicals produced at the newly-built production processes for hours to acquaint himself in detail with the construction and production there.
					
					 Looking at the processes equipped with ultra-modern facilities and varieties of quality chemical products turned out there, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the complex have successfully completed the huge project equivalent to the construction of a big factory by their own efforts and with their own technology in a short span of time.
					
					 It is something miraculous that the workers of the complex have built such a great new district for the production of dyes and agricultural chemicals fully meeting the need of the IT age, while keeping the production going at a high rate at the complex, he said.
					
					 He highly praised and thanked them for having built such a great structure by displaying patriotic devotion.
					
					 The workers of the complex have radically changed its appearance as required by the new century even under the hard conditions where everything was in short supply by fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude in hearty response to the slogan "When the Party is determined, we can do anything!" and thus made it possible to more strikingly demonstrate the might of the Juche-oriented industry, he noted. He added that such signal success clearly proves the inexhaustible mental power of the Korean people ready to flatten at one go even a high mountain, when required by the party to do so.
					
					 Saying that the complex has a very important position and role in developing the nation's economy, he advanced the tasks to be fulfilled by the complex.
					
					 If the second phase reconstruction project is completed at the complex, it will have all processes for turning out varieties of products by use of vinalon intermediate products to bring about a radical turn in the chemical industry, he said, indicating an orientation and ways to do so.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the gasification process construction site of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 After being briefed on the process before a map on the gasification process construction, he went round the site to learn in detail about the progress made in the project.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the workers and builders of the complex have successfully pushed forward the huge construction project, he highly estimated the successes made in their drive to build the nation's structure of eternal value.
					
					 The gasification process of the complex is of weighty importance in boosting the fertilizer production, he noted, setting forth the tasks to be fulfilled to wind up the project earlier than scheduled.
					
					 Noting that the production of ammonia through gasification is the most profitable Juche-based method of producing fertilizers, entirely depending on locally available raw resources while consuming less electricity, he called for focusing all efforts on the project to dynamically push ahead with it.
					
					 He underscored the need to complete the above-said project in a brief span of time in order to increase the fertilizer production. He showed such great care as unraveling knotty problems on the spot.
					
					 He was accompanied by Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performances
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performances
Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed art performances given by art squads of the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers of diverse genres as choruses "My Country Is Eternal Country of the Leader" and "May, Month of Victory", band music and song "The Glow over Kangson", male solo "My Beloved Factory", singing in unison and story-telling "Hungnam Is Alive with Farm Fields", agitation with song "Are We Living like in Those Days?" and drum-beating and song "Let Us Glorify Socialism on Songun Fleet Steed".
					
					 After watching performances Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the fact that workers of the complexes gave performances perfect in ideological contents and artistry as they truthfully reflect their life. He extended high appreciation and thanks to all performers and creators for the successful performances and showed such great loving care as inviting them to give performances in Pyongyang.
					
					 He said that the popular art in full bloom among workers of the complexes serves as an example of noble new culture of the workers in the era of Songun based on the revolutionary soldier culture.
					
					 It is something laudable that workers of the post-war generation, in particular, have reliably preserved the noble revolutionary spirit displayed by the workers of the preceding generation and given steady continuity to their spirit, he noted, stressing that unshakable is the revolutionary position of the workers of the DPRK thanks to the large contingent of such dependable workers of the new generation.
					
					 Noting that revolutionary art serves as a powerful means greatly encouraging the people in their revolutionary struggle by emotionally moving them and stirring up their thinking and spirit, he indicated tasks to be fulfilled to further intensify popular cultural and performing activities.  
					
					 Among the audience were Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, department directors and first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee and leading officials of the province and the complexes.

articles.title: Dozens of Science Films Produced
articles.content:
Dozens of Science Films Produced
 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio produced dozens of science films this year, contributing to widely disseminating new technological achievements.
					 Science film "UHP electric arc furnace, core of steel industry" introduces the furnace scientifically in a way easy to understand. It stirs up the enthusiasm of people to acquire the cutting-edge science and technology on their own.
					
					 "Insulating fire brick helpful to cutting down the consumption of electricity," "Let us ensure rated power frequency" and other science films contribute to boosting electricity production and further economizing it.
					
					 There are also science films introducing the principle of increasing per generator output with existing equipment and coal of low caloric value as well as scientific and technological knowledge essential for the construction of dwelling houses.
					
					 Science film "Modern tile production" deals with the streamlined production processes at the Taedonggang Tile Factory and their advantages. The film vividly introduces quality tiles widely used in the construction of modern structures and dwelling houses.
					
					 "Otter rabbit", "Fast fattening food additive for pigs" and "Let us prevent slipped disk" and other science films are also helpful to improving the standard of people's living and promoting their health.

articles.title: Production of Medicinal Herbs on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Medicinal Herbs on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK set spring and autumn as months for cultivating medicinal herbs to increase their production.
					 In this fall the gathering of medicinal herbs and its procurement are making brisk headway as an all-people work.
					
					 Provincial, city and county people's committees and relevant units properly chose varieties of medicinal herbs and are providing necessary labor force in time.
					
					 Units specializing in the cultivation of medicinal herbs and sub-workteams for medicinal herbs at co-op farms organize the specific work to gather a lot of medicinal herbs such as Rehmannia glutinosa, Paeonia suffruticosa and Artemisia maritima.
					
					 Pukchang County in South Phyongan Province and Pakchon County in North Phyongan Province, in particular, produced unusually large quantities of medicinal herbs this year. 
					
					 The Rangnang District Medicinal Herbs Office in Pyongyang fulfilled its production plan for this year ahead of the schedule. 
					
					 Factories, enterprises and people's neighborhood units in different parts of the country gathered many medicinal herbs in fields once left uncultivated.
					
					 Roots of broad bellflower, fruits of gingko, Chinese matrimony vine and others are gathered from medicinal plants and trees cultivated in parks, pleasure grounds, yards of houses and around the fences of houses. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the gathered medicinal herbs and the fruits of medicinal trees are sent to the Koryo medicine production centers in time.

articles.title: More Modern Villages Appear in DPRK
articles.content:
More Modern Villages Appear in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- The number of modern rural villages is on the steady increase in the DPRK.
					Hundreds of thousands of modern houses have sprung up in the countryside over the last decade, taking the country as a whole. The villages are called ideal socialist ones as they are made up of such houses where electricity is widely used for lighting and heating and methane gas for cooking and a lot of fruit trees grow. 
					
					40 cozy new modern houses were built at the foot of Mt. Mira in Migok-ri, Sariwon City. The village is called "apricot village".
					
					Poman-ri is well known to the country as a village good to live in. The appearance of the Hwangjin hot-spring village in the area of Mt. Chilbo has changed beyond recognition. 
					
					The Town Cooperative Farm in Sinphyong County is called "Kamsalgu village". Unhung Co-op Farm in Thaechon County is surrounded by forests with the Handre Plain extending far and wide. Villages in Phyongam-ri, Koksan County is proud of apple trees. Undok village in Yangdong-ri, Unpha County is famous for date trees. Manphung village in Ryangdam-ri, Unchon County boasts orchards of fruit trees of various species. All these villages present spectacular scenery in the era of Songun. 
					
					An ostrich farm on the outskirts of Pyongyang sets an example of the times in creating woodland and greenery. It is reminiscent of a vast arboretum and a rest home as it has more than 100 corrals and production buildings including meat processing factory and is surrounded by at least 560,000 trees of over 50 species. 
					
					There is a thick forest of hundreds of thousands of trees of more than 250 species in the campus of Wonsan University of Agriculture. 
					
					At least 25,000 trees of more than 60 species and over 3,000 flower bushes offer spectacular scenery in the compound of the Pyongyang Textile Mill. The bank extending more than 12 kilometers along the beach of the West Sea has turned into a thick woodland covering at least 150 hectares. 
					
					Streets in Kaesong City with Gingko trees tinged yellow add to the beauty of the autumnal scenery as a city with long-standing history and culture. Tara vine trees, each fruit weighing 100 g on an average, are found in every part of the city. 
					
					During the spring tree planting period alone several hundred million trees are planted throughout the country, bringing the average number of the trees planted by each person every year to 150 or 200. As a result, it is turning into a thick woodland and greenery.

articles.title: Sariwon Fruit Farm
articles.content:
Sariwon Fruit Farm
 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- There is the Sariwon Fruit Farm in the suburbs of Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK.
					 The farm is covered with fruit trees such as apple, pear, peach, apricot and plum and grape vine.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung chose the land for the farm and sent thousands of roots of grape vine there long ago. And he also sent vehicles including tractors and equipment necessary for the operation of the farm.
					
					 The President visited the farm several times, indicating orientations and ways for boosting the fruit production.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has successfully translated the lofty intention of the President into reality visited the farm and gave a detailed instruction to supply people with more fruits and saw to it that necessary materials were sent to it for the management of the orchard.
					
					 The farm which produced just hundreds of tons of fruits a year early in the 1960s has increased its production to thousands of tons.
					
					 In recent years the farm replaced its fruit trees with high-yielding fruit trees including low apple trees and built even a winery near it.
					
					 The farm supplies fruits not only to the people in its province including Sariwon but also to those in other areas.

articles.title: Patriotic Long Journey for Happiness of People
articles.content:
Long Journey for Happiness of People
Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- The news of field guidance ceaselessly being provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people greatly encourages the Korean people in their 100-day campaign.
					He has visited lots of units including the Taedonggang Food stuff  Factory, the Pyongyang Catfish Farm, the Central Tree Nursery, the Ostrich Farm, the North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre and the Suphung Power Station in more than one month since the start of the campaign.
					
					 Wherever he went, he asked first whether people liked buildings and goods and learned in detail about how helpful they were to their living. 
					
					 It is his firm resolution and aim to provide the Korean people with the best living conditions suited to a great, prosperous and powerful nation. 
					
					The Pothonggang Shop which supplies various kinds of fresh fruits and meat and quality processed meat to citizens, the newly built recreation ground in Mt. Myohyang, new apartment houses in Mansudae Street and other monumental edifices in the Songun era are associated with the warm loving care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He finds his happiness and joy in those enjoyed by the people and regards it as his immense honor and pride to work for the sake of the people. Happier laughter can be heard from every corner of the country thanks to his noble view on them and patriotic devotion. 
					
					 He is making endless journeys with boundless loving care and devotion, always saying the slogan "We serve the people!" fully reflects the unshakable will and determination of the Workers' Party of Korea to provide happiness to the people, giving primary consideration to their interests.
					
					The Korean people extend warmest gratitude to Kim Jong Il for having worked heart and soul for accomplishing this great cause day and night and renew their determination to build a thriving socialist nation in this land without fail under his guidance.

articles.title: Bolstering Military Capability for Self-Defence Called for
articles.content:
Bolstering Military Capability for Self-Defence Called for
 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- A country with strong defence capability can protect its authority and dignity and achieve national prosperity. Rodong Sinmun says this in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 If a country fails to bolster its military capability for self-defence, it is bound to come under the imperialists' political and economic pressure and become their slaves no matter what affluent material life its people may lead. 
					
					 Aggression and plunder are the invariable nature of the imperialists. They are now working hard to establish a world order whereby they can lord it over the world, perpetrating high-handed and arbitrary practices in the international arena. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove that from a historical point of view the imperialists look down upon those countries with weak military power, force them to meet their unilateral and brigandish demands and consider them as targets of their armed intervention and aggression, the article goes on:
					
					 If a country, though small, increases defence capability, attaching importance to military affairs, the imperialists dare not attack it. This is clearly evidenced by the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The war deterrent of the DPRK serves as a powerful treasured sword for protecting the Korean nation from outside forces' aggression and the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The confrontation with the imperialist aggressor forces is, in essence, a showdown of strength and force alone can work on the imperialists. 
					
					 A country without strong military power can neither defeat imperialism nor defend itself and the nation and the people's security. This is the hard reality today.

articles.title: Struggle for Independence against U.S. Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Independence against U.S. Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea made public a declaration on Nov. 3 on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the Kwangju student incident.
					The solidarity in the declaration said that the students' mass anti-Japanese resistance triggered off by the incident in which Japanese students molested and insulted Korean girl students in Kwangju 80 years ago was an eruption of Korean youth and students' resentment at the Japanese imperialists' harsh colonial predatory policy and an expression of their firm will to liberate Korea at any cost.
					
					The colonial history still persists on this land though decades have passed since then, the organization deplored.
					
					The U.S. forces that landed in south Korea under the mask of "liberator" after the Japanese imperialists' defeat have forced the people of south Korea into colonial slavery, wantonly infringing upon its sovereignty and dignity, the organization noted, calling for forcing the U.S. forces, the provocateur of the Korean war and harasser of peace, to quit south Korea by carrying forward the fighting spirit displayed by Kwangju youth and students.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Lao Figure
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Lao Figure
 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Khamphanh Sitthidampha, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union who doubles as vice-chairman of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association who visited the DPRK, expressed great admiration at the greatness of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He went on:
					
					 While staying in the DPRK, we visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace where the President lies in state, the President's birthplace at Mangyongdae, the International Friendship Exhibition and various other places.
					
					 In this course we clearly realized that the President was a peerlessly great man.
					
					 The President who embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years led the arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory, liberating the country.
					
					 In the whole period of leading the revolution and construction the President always gave primary consideration to the interests of the popular masses and made sure that everything served them.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK highly laud the President as the great father and the sun of Juche.
					
					 The President's founding of the immortal Juche idea was the most brilliant of the feats performed by him.
					
					 Displayed in the International Friendship Exhibition are gifts the President received from party and state leaders of many countries of the world, prominent figures and peoples. 
					
					 What touched us all the more is the fact that foreigners sincerely prepared gifts for the President and sent them to the DPRK even after his demise.
					
					 This is an expression of all people's reverence for the President which will last forever along with his great feats.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported in Britain
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported in Britain
 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain was held in Manchester on Oct. 31.
					 A report and speeches were made there.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, representative of the branch, in a report introduced the dynamic activities conducted by the branch in support of the just cause of the Korean people in the past and underlined the need to further expand its work.
					
					 Shawn Pikford, secretary general of the branch, recalled that the Korean people under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung achieved a shining victory in the Korean war launched by the U.S. imperialists in the 1950s.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK is firmly defending its sovereignty from the U.S., he said that the DPRK's nuclear deterrent is justifiable and it will surely build a thriving nation thanks to the might of the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A professor at University of London urged the U.S. to pull its forces of aggression from south Korea at once, holding that Korea's reunification should be achieved independently and peacefully free from outside interference.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated in Peru
 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting for celebrating the 64th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was held in Lima on October 28 under the co-sponsorship of the American regional preparatory committee and the Peruvian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Congratulatory letters to the Peruvian Communist Party, the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", the New Left Movement of Peru and the Popular Union of Women of Peru were read out at the meeting. 
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, Yuri Castro Romero,  secretary general of the PeruvianÔºçKorean Institute of Culture and Friendship, and other personages spoke at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers praised the WPK as the most powerful party, a party which took deep roots among the popular masses and a true mother party that considers it as its noble mission to improve the standard of people's living.
					
					They said that socialist Korea has steadily made a long drive as the WPK put forward the army as a main force of the revolution true to the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and defended the country and pushed forward socialist construction in reliance upon it.
					
					 Noting that the WPK called on the officials to serve the people, they stressed that this party is an example to be followed by the political parties of all countries. 
					
					 A program for organizing an international art and literary prize contest to commemorate the centenary of birth of 
					
					President Kim Il Sung and an appeal were made public at the meeting. 
					
					 The participants of the meeting watched the Korean film "Korean People's Army, Steel Strong-Ranks".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno complejos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno complejos
Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y el campo de construccion del proceso de gasificacion del Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam.
					Primeramente, el Dirigente estuvo en el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero.
					
					Luego de escuchar ante el plano del proceso de produccion explicaciones, el recorrio varias horas las cadenas de produccion de tintes y de productos agroquimicos cerciorandose concretamente del estado de construccion y de produccion.
					
					Al ver los modernos procesos equipados con las instalaciones de punta y varios articulos quimicos de buena calidad, se mostro muy satisfecho de que al apoyarse en sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas, los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos del complejo terminaron con exito durante el corto plazo de tiempo la vasta obra equivalente a la construccion de una gran fabrica.
					
					Dijo que es un milagro asombroso el que la clase obrera de la empresa normaliza en alto nivel la produccion en vigor y, al mismo tiempo, construyo una nueva area de produccion de tintes-productos agroquimicos tan magnificos que refleja suficientemente la demanda de la epoca de IT y evaluo altamente las proezas de los obreros quienes levantaron una gran creacion monumental poniendo de manifiesto la abnegacion patriotica y les dio su agradecimiento.
					
					Apunto que al poner de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y de tenaz lucha bajo la consigna "!Si el Partido decide, lo cumplimos!", los obreros de la empresa cambiaron radicalmente  de la fisonomia de la fabrica conforme a la demanda de nuevo siglo aun en las condiciones tan dificiles, gracias a lo cual pudieron manifestar con mas vigor el poderio de la industria jucheana y agrego que este exito orgulloso demuestra patentemente la inagotable potencia espiritual de nuestro pueblo dispuesto a trasladar de una vez los montes si lo quiere el Partido.
					
					Diciendo que son muy importantes la posicion y el papel de este Complejo en el desarrollo economico del pais, presento las tareas que le incumben a este.
					
					Recalco que se registrara un cambio trascendental en la industria quimica porque si termina la obra de reconstruccion de segunda etapa del Complejo, se acondicionaran completamente todos los procesos capaces de producir varios articulos valiendose de los productos intermedios de vinalon e ilumino el rumbo y los remedios para el particular.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente dirigio sobre el terreno el campo de construccion del proceso de gasificacion del Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano del proceso de la gasificacion, recorrio el lugar de construccion para hacer conocimiento detallado del estado de promocion de la obra.
					
					Expreso gran satisfaccion de que los obreros y los constructores del Complejo impulsan exitosamente la gigantesca obra de construccion y evaluo altamente el exito de lucha de ellos quienes crean las riquezas eternas del pais.
					
					El proceso de gasificacion del Complejo tiene suma importancia en el aumento de la produccion de abonos, senalo y planteo las tareas que se presentan para adelantar la obra de construccion.
					
					Dijo que la produccion de amoniaco segun la gasificacion es el eficiente metodo de produccion de abonos al estilo coreano que permite incrementar trascendentalmente la produccion de abonos con poca energia electrica, materias primas y recursos criollos y agrego que hay que concentrar todas las fuerzas a impulsarla.
					
					Senalo que a fin de aumentar la produccion de abonos, es preciso terminar durante corto plazo de tiempo la obra en cuestion y dispenso la gran benevolencia de solucionar en el terreno los problemas pendientes.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve funcion artistica de empleados de complejos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve funcion artistica de empleados de complejos
  Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de grupos artisticos de los empleados del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam.
					  En la escena se presentaron diversas piezas, entre ellas, el coro "Mi pais es el eterno pais del Lider" y "Mayo de victorias", la musica de instrumento de viento y cancion "Arreboles en Kangson", el solo masculino "Mi querida fabrica", el canto homofono y narracion "Hungnam vive con la llanura de la granja", la cancion y agitacion "?Vivimos como en aquel tiempo?" y el tambor y cancion "Brillemos el socialismo montando el caballo dragon del Songun".
					
					  Tras verla el Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que los obreros del Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam y el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero hayan hecho la excelente funcion perfecta en el sentido ideologico y artistico que reflejan bien su vida laboral y aprecio en alto el exito de la funcion.
					
					  El dio agradecimiento a todos los ejecutantes y creadores y dispenso gran benevolencia de invitarlos para que ofrezcan la funcion en Pyongyang.
					
					  El Dirigente dijo que el arte masivo, que florece plenamente entre los obreros del complejo, sirve de modelo de noble y nueva cultura de la clase obrera de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar), cuya base es la cultura revolucionaria de los militares.
					
					  En particular, es de veras orgulloso el que los obreros de nueva generacion, nacidos en la postguerra, defienden y heredan con firmeza el noble espiritu revolucionario de la clase obrera de la generacion anterior, destaco y subrayo que gracias al gran destacamento de los obreros de la nueva generacion confiable, es invencible la posicion revolucionaria de nuestra clase obrera.
					
					  Senalo que el arte revolucionario es el poderoso medio que conmueve a los hombres y los estimulan con vigor a la lucha revolucionaria activando su idea y espiritu y presento las tareas que se presentan para desarrollar activamente las actividades culturales y artisticas entre las masas.
					
					  Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur Thae Jong Su, el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC y los funcionarios directivos de la provincia y dichas empresas.

articles.title: Personalidad de Laos elogia a Kim Il Sung como gran hombre
articles.content:
Personalidad de Laos elogia a Kim Il Sung como gran hombre
 Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Popular Revolucionaria Lao y vicepresidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Laos-Corea, Khamphanh Sitthidampha, de visita en Corea, expreso su gran emocion a la noble personalidad del Presidente    Kim Il Sung.
					  Durante nuestra estancia aqui, visitamos el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan donde se conserva eternamente el cuerpo del Presidente, su casa natal en Mangyongdae, la Exposicion Permanente de Amistad Internacional y otros lugares, senalo Khamphanh y continuo:
					
					  En este proceso sentimos profundamente que el Presidente es el gran hombre sin par.
					
					  El Presidente, quien emprendio temprano el camino de la revolucion, condujo a la victoria la ardua lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa y libero el pais.
					
					  Durante todo el periodo de su direccion sobre la revolucion y la construccion, el antepuso siempre los intereses de las masas populares e hizo que todos sirvieran para ellas.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea elogian al Presidente como gran padre y Sol del Juche.
					
					  La creacion de la inmortal idea Juche ocupa el mas brillante lugar de entre las hazanas realizadas por el.
					
					  En la Exposicion Permanente de Amistad Internacional estan exhibidos los regalos dirigidos al Presidente por los jefes de partido y de Estado, renombradas personalidades y los pueblos de numerosos paises del mundo.
					
					  Lo sorprendente es la verdad de que tambien despues del fallecimiento del Presidente, las personalidades extranjeras le envian los regalos preparados con sinceridad.
					
					  Esto es una muestra del respeto y veneracion de todo el mundo a ser eternos junto con las grandes hazanas del gran hombre sin par.

articles.title: Corea produce mucho hierbas medicinales
articles.content:
Corea produce mucho hierbas medicinales
 Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Corea define la primavera y el otono como meses de cultivo de plantas medicinales y aumenta la cantidad de su produccion.
					  En la actual temporada de otono, la recoleccion y el acopio de plantas medicinales se libran como una labor de todas las masas.
					
					  Los comites populares de las provincias, ciudades y distritos y los sectores correspondientes eligen correctamente las especies de plantas medicinales y aseguran a tiempo la mano de obra necesaria.
					
					  Las unidades que se dedican exclusivamente al cultivo de las plantas medicinales y los subequipos de las mismas de las granjas cooperativas  organizan con escrupulosidad la labor para recoger muchas plantas medicinales inclusive Rehmannia gulutinosa, raiz de peonia y santonico.
					
					  Sobre todo, en el distrito de Pukchang de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y el de Pakchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte acopiaron muchas plantas medicinales sin precedentes.
					
					   El centro de administracion de plantas medicinales del capitalino municipio de Rangnang cumplio con anticipacion el plan de produccion para este ano.
					
					  Las fabricas, empresas y unidades de vecinos de todo el pais sembraron muchas plantas medicinales y cosecharon la gran cantidad.
					
					   Tambien recogen la campanula, los frutos de gingko, cambronera, etc. en los parques, jardines de recreo, patios y alrededores de cercas de las casas. 
					
					  Por otra parte, se envian a tiempo las plantas y frutos de los arboles medicinales cosechados a las bases de produccion de medicina tradicional Coryo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun subraya necesidad de fortalecer la capacidad militar
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun subraya necesidad de fortalecer la capacidad militar
Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Solo cuando cada pais cuenta con las potentes fuerzas militares, puede defender su autoridad y dignidad y lograr la prosperidad de la nacion. 
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido en su edicion de este viernes y continua:
					
					Si no intensifica la capacidad militar de autodefensa, tambien el pais, que goza de abundante vida material, se oprimira en lo politico y economico por los imperialistas y se vera en la situacion esclava. 
					
					La agresion y el saqueo son la naturaleza invariable del imperialismo. 
					
					Hoy dia, los imperialistas pretenden manejar a su antojo el orden del mundo cometiendo el despotismo y las arbitrariedades en la palestra internacional. 
					
					Historicamente, los imperialistas desprecian a los paises con la debil capacidad militar, les imponen su demanda gangsteril y unilateral y los toman por objeto de intervencion armada y de agresion. 
					
					Pero, ellos no se atreven a atentar a un pais, aunque sea pequeno, que da importancia a los asuntos militares y fortalece la capacidad militar. Lo prueba la realidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El disuasivo de guerra de la RPDC es el remedio omnipotente para defender a la nacion desde la agresion de las fuerzas extranjeras y preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La confrontacion con las fuerzas agresoras imperialistas es, en su esencia, la de la fuerza. 
					
					  Sin el fuerte poderio militar, no pueden vencer al imperialismo ni defender el pais, la nacion y la seguridad del pueblo.
